sen.j: 元は六条藤家の顕昭によって書かれた『古今和歌集』の用語に対する注釈書を対立関係にあった御子左家の藤原定家が秘かに見る機会を得て春歌上巻の部分を写し、これに自説（藤原俊成以来の御子左家の歌道家学）を「密勘」として書き加えた物である。
sen.e: The book was written by Teika FUJIWARA of the Mikohidari family who had had a chance to secretly read commentaries on Kokin Wakashu originally made by Kensho FUJIWARA of the rival Rokujo Toke (Rokujo Fujiwara family), transcribed the commentaries in its first volume of Spring Poetry part and added his own reviews (based on the Mikohidari family's poetry school established by FUJIWARA no Toshinari) as "mikkan" (personal views), to thereby complete his own version.

sen.j: 顕昭と定家の説に大きな違いはないものの、考証主義的な六条藤家と芸術的解釈の御子左家の観点の違いが反映された部分も見られる。
sen.e: Although there is no significant difference between Kensho's views and Teika's, some parts reflect differences in the bases of viewpoints between the Rokujo Toke who weighed much in the historical authenticity and the Mikohidari family who weighed much in the artistic interpretation.

sen.j: 定家は跋に「返々も窓のほかに出され侍まじ」と記して子孫に対してこの書の門外不出を求めている。
sen.e: Teika left a note in the end of the book, "Make sure not to take this book outside the window" which instructed his posterity never to allow the book to be taken out of the house.
